mainText:
I sit on my couch with my MacBook on my lap....but I don't think about  
the hardware...or even the innovation...what I think about is the  
passion and the vision of an insanely great man who had the courage to  
forge a path that was his and believe that by doing that the world  
would be a better.

I hope I can have the courage to walk my own path with the same  
conviction.
author: Brenda
